item.description: Dancing outside on the shores of Cedar Lake to live music of INTRIGUE ...It is a great time...A nice warm summer night...Live music, drinks, food and dancing Come get a nice meal and dance till 10 PM Rain cancels out I will cancel by 600 PM if weather is bad Meet at the outside bar next to the Oxhead Tavern DIRECTIONS: FROM WORCESTER RT 20 WEST TO STURBRIDGE GO PAST WALMART PLAZA INTO STURBRIDGE TAKE RIGHT JUST BEFORE MCDONALDS ON YOUR RIGHT SIDE GO THRU THE PARKING LOT OXHEAD TAVERN WILL BE TO YOUR FAR LEFT..... LAKE IS BEHIND IT...ENTER TO THE RIGHT OF THE OXHEAD...YOU'LL SEE THE BAR ALL THE WAY DOWN TO THE LEFT NEAR THE VOLLEYBALL COURT i'LL BE WEARING GREEN TORNADOES HAT i WILL SEND MY CELL TO YES PEOPLE LATER TODAY IN CASE YOU GET LOST!
item.how_to_find_us: Green Tornadoes Hat Meet at the outside bar at 730
item.name: Oxhead Tavern Live music outside on Cedar Lake Sturbridge
